Tecopay-Web

An advanced admin dashboard to manage the Tecopay system. Features include user roles, store management, and data analysis.

React.js TypeScript Tailwind.css
Repo ↗

Tecopay Web is an advanced administrative dashboard designed to manage the Tecopay system. The admin user can assign roles to other users and add or edit associated stores. The dashboard also includes charts and data to track active users, points in circulation, and more.
